meanings.definition: A person who uses a pumice stone to smooth rough skin.
meanings.sent1: The pumicers at the spa help make feet soft and smooth.
meanings.sent2: She became a skilled pumicers after practicing on her own calluses.
meanings.sent3: The pumicers joked that they could turn a rough rock into a silky stone.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were like pumicers, gently refining the rough edges of the stone.
meanings.sent5: The pumicers' touch was like magic, transforming roughness into softness.

meanings.definition: The act of using a pumice stone to exfoliate the skin.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, she enjoyed the relaxing ritual of pumicers on her heels.
meanings.sent2: Regular pumicers can help keep your skin healthy and glowing.
meanings.sent3: The pumicers session felt like a mini spa treatment at home.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to pumicers was evident in her smooth, radiant skin.
meanings.sent5: The gentle strokes of the pumicers revealed baby-soft skin underneath.
